title: PSA Stop Typing IN RANKED
body:
literally, unless its: "graves botside" or "mid mia" stop going afk in the middle of lane to type about what's happening BOT SIDE or TOP SIDE. Nobody in all chat cares if you're pissed in fact, they want to see you pissed the hell off because they're getting free LP. 

For all you monkeys crying about how you lost your season rewards (I mean the people who have been playing all season)I'm sorry that really sucks. The matchmaking system sucks, they put that guy who hasnt played a single game of ranked all season in your game and screwed your promos, I get it, but let these losers who decide to wait till the end of the season to ~~feed~~ play report themselves, cuss, and fight each other out and stop typing to them. cut your goal off earlier than the end of the season and say: "ok this was my peak. don't let the frustrated trolls ruin it for you.
